channel.title: Speaking at Microsoft TechEd Developers 2007 in Barcelona
channel.description: I'm joining my good friend Brian Randell to do a session on Team Build 2008 at TechEd Developers in Barcelona on November 8th.  If you are at TechEd then please do come along - it is shaping up to be a fun...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Adrian+00:00
item.description: Enjoy TechEd and good luck wiht the talk. Adrian
item.dc:creator: Adrian
